true |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Get the latest Updates from Compex Systems - [http://eepurl.com/bXB9j5 Link] ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4028 @600MHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU *256MB RAM (System Memory), 128MB (NAND Flash)/16MB (NOR Flash) *Dual SIM Card Holder *On-board 2.4GHz max 20dBm output power (per chain) *On-board 5GHz max 17dBm output power (per chain) *802.11ac compliant & backward compatible with 802.11b/g/n *2x2 On-board 5GHz radio with up to 867Mbps physical data rate *2x2 On-board 2.4GHz radio with up to 300Mbps physical data rate *2x Gigabit Ethernet LAN RJ45 port with Auto-MDIX *802.3af/at POE and Passive PoE (range 36-56V) ===Applications=== *802.11n/ac Access Point *Point-to-Point High Capacity Wireless Bridge *Point-to-MultiPoint High Capacity Wireless Bridge *Wireless Base Station *Wireless Customer-Premises Equipment (CPE) ===Purchase Sample=== [http://shop.compex.com.sg/wpj428.html Compex System Sample Store] ====Ordering Configuration==== 
Item Cod      Chipset	               Board Information
WPJ428-TE     IPQ4028    2x2 MU-MIMO 802.11ac 2.4/5GHz SoC radio with NGFF slot
